name: Quiet Llama
description:
A new and original horror game about a psycho llama that has been possessed by the deceased  owner of the farm who had gone crazy saying spirits were forcing him to build them homes and worship them. He killed himself, now you are stuck on his farm and you must escape. 

This game was made within a week by one person who is the person writing this right now. I am new to game development and this is my first mediocre game. This game is based off of the quiet llama hand sign also known as quiet coyote.
